SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw.am40
Package it.polimi.ingsw.am40.client.network.RMI

Interface RemoteInterfaceClient

All Superinterfaces:
Remote
All Known Implementing Classes:
RemoteObjectClient
public interface RemoteInterfaceClient extends Remote
Interface RemoteInterfaceClients is used by the server to call methods on the client (RMI). These methods are "callable" in the network.
